meanings.definition: The act of surpassing or outdoing someone in a competitive or confrontational situation.
meanings.sent1: Her upmanships in the game were evident as she consistently outperformed her opponents.
meanings.sent2: His upmanships in the debate competition led him to victory.
meanings.sent3: The siblings engaged in friendly upmanships to see who could finish their chores first.
meanings.sent4: In the world of business, upmanships can determine the success of a company.
meanings.sent5: The upmanships between the two teams created an exciting atmosphere at the match.

meanings.definition: The quality of being superior or dominant in a particular situation.
meanings.sent1: The upmanships of the champion boxer were unmatched in the ring.
meanings.sent2: The upmanships of the leader inspired others to follow her example.
meanings.sent3: The cat displayed its upmanships by claiming the comfiest spot on the couch.
meanings.sent4: Her upmanships shone through during the challenging project, earning her recognition.
meanings.sent5: The upmanships of the eagle allowed it to soar high above the treetops.
